StudioEncryptionConfiguration.description: Configuration of the encryption method that is used for the studio.

properties.name: KeyArn
properties.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

type.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

StudioEncryptionConfigurationKeyType.description: The type of KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

resource.description: Represents a studio that contains other Nimble Studio resources

properties.name: AdminRoleArn
properties.description: The IAM role that Studio Admins will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.

type.description: The IAM role that Studio Admins will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.

properties.name: StudioName
properties.description: The studio name that is used in the URL of the Nimble Studio portal when accessed by Nimble Studio users.

type.description: The studio name that is used in the URL of the Nimble Studio portal when accessed by Nimble Studio users.

properties.name: UserRoleArn
properties.description: The IAM role that Studio Users will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.

type.description: The IAM role that Studio Users will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.

attributes.description: Represents a studio that contains other Nimble Studio resources

properties.name: HomeRegion
properties.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the studio resource is located.

type.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the studio resource is located.

properties.name: SsoClientId
properties.description: The Amazon Web Services SSO application client ID used to integrate with Amazon Web Services SSO to enable Amazon Web Services SSO users to log in to Nimble Studio portal.

type.description: The Amazon Web Services SSO application client ID used to integrate with Amazon Web Services SSO to enable Amazon Web Services SSO users to log in to Nimble Studio portal.

properties.name: StudioUrl
properties.description: The address of the web page for the studio.

type.description: The address of the web page for the studio.
